Package sbw.architecture.bus.protocol

Class A_Request

java.lang.Object
sbw.architecture.bus.protocol.A_Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
A_RequestFollowup, RequestInform, RequestService
public abstract class A_Request extends Object
Defines the shared elements of a bus request, which defines a desired action to be considered by a servicer on a bus.

    A_Request.E_RequestStatus
    Defines the states that a request can be in.
